briefTitle: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of REL-1017 as Monotherapy for Major Depressive Disorder (MDD)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of REL-1017 Monotherapy for Major Depressive Disorder
summary: This is an outpatient, 2-arm, Phase 3, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to assess the efficacy and safety of REL-1017 once daily (QD) as a monotherapy for Major Depressive Disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in the MADRS10 Total Score From Baseline to Day 28
